text:
Shriram Lagoo (16 November 1927 – 17 December 2019) was an Indian actor. He was known for his character roles in movies. He acted in over 100 Hindi and Marathi movies. He won the 1978 Filmfare Best Supporting Actor Award for the Hindi movie "Gharaonda". He also starred in the movie "Gandhi".
Lagoo died at a hospital in Pune of cardiac arrest on 17 December 2019 at the age of 92.
